body.bibl: Maas, Paul. “[Review of:] Mercati, S.G., S. Ephraem Syri Opera, Textum Syriacum Graecum Latinum Ad Fidem Codicum Recensuit, Prolegomenis Notis Indicibus Instruxit. T. I, Fasc. 1: Sermones in Abraham et Isaac, in Basilium Magnum, in Eliam (Monumenta Biblica et Ecclesiastica 1; Roma: Pontifical Biblical Institute, 1915).” Byzantinische Zeitschrift 23 (1919 1914): 451–52.
